mil3.7.9:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.7.9:1.2_0: “Since there is an elephant with this body, would he go to the Brahmā realm or another Brahmā realm?”
mil3.7.9:1.3_0: “But great king, is there any other ascetic or brahmin at Uttarakuru or the Brahmā realm?”
mil3.7.9:2.1_0: “But sir, how does Nāgadatta go to the Brahmā realm by psychic power with this body made up of the four primary elements?”
mil3.7.9:2.2_0: “Great king, do you know whether this land of the earth, Vessāmitta?”
mil3.7.9:2.4_0: “Great king, how do you believe that?”
mil3.7.9:2.5_0: “Sir, I’ll give rise to thought: ‘I’ll breathe in. My body is light and fit for work.’”
mil3.7.9:2.6_0: “In the same way, there are psychic power with psychic powers who has achieved mind, a mendicant with psychic powers, and a mind flying through the air.”
